item.Name: Don't use FP bank in split-screen#don't use the high quality first person bank in split-screen
Stream off DVD only#Files will not be played off HD, only DVD (for music, etc)
Can delay start#Can delay start time for a short period waiting for bank to load
Don't load for player#Use this if there's a special player bank that's loaded by other means (ie weapon, vehicle).
Ground forces sound bank#Don't load this bank if player is in a vehicle (ie bipeds, footsteps)

_field_block.name: Sound bank list#List of names of soundbanks. If more than one, one will be randomly chosen at load

_field_string_id.name: Sound bank name#Name of the main sound bank.

_field_long_integer.name: Bank priority#the importance of this bank over others. 1 is highest priority (ie will bump all others)
